summary: This code imports necessary libraries and continuously executes a redis-cli command every 'tm' seconds to save the program's state in Redis.

details.comment: This code imports necessary libraries and continuously executes a redis-cli command every 'tm' seconds to save the program's state in Redis.
details.content:
import time,os,sys
sv = sys.argv
#print(sv)
tm = 2
if len(sv) == 2:
    tm = int(sv[1])
while True:
    time.sleep(tm)
    os.system("redis-cli bgsave")
